title: Senior Data Scientist
description: Our team is looking for a Senior Data Scientist to extract actionable insights from complex datasets. You will be responsible for designing and implementing machine learning models, conducting statistical analyses, and communicating findings to stakeholders. Key tasks include data cleaning and preprocessing, feature engineering, and evaluating model performance using rigorous metrics. The ideal candidate has a strong background in mathematics or statistics, proficiency in Python (NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn), and experience with data visualization tools. You should be able to turn abstract business problems into data-driven solutions and have a track record of deploying models into production environments.
